favourite.article: Divine operation operates, penetrates and recovers a wrech like me to function by His all sufficient grace.

This hymn is really pretty--touched my heart deeply and brought tears to my eyes.
I love You Lord Jesus.
last verse would speak better if, "lo, you've broke my chains, I can do nothing, I cannot even break my chains."

For Thou hast made the blind to see, The deaf to hear, the dumb to speak, The dead to live; and, lo, I break The chains of my captivity.
Thank You Lord for this complete salvation.
Lord, I was deaf; I could not hear the thrilling music of Thy voice; but now I hear Thee and rejoice, and all Thine uttered words are dear!
CHUA OI NGAI THAT DIEU KI CHO CHUNG CON! CHUNG CON CAM ON NGAI !CON YEU NGAI! AMEN HALELUGIA
I love this hymn so much. It really touches my heart.
I was all these things, but by Gods mercy, He healed me!!!
惟愿人人以鴿子眼日日仰望至愛主~!
Praise the Lord. I like this song because it touches my heart to love Him to the uttermost. Hallelujah!
